artist: Designer: Theodore R. Davis; Manufacturer: Haviland et Cie.
creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of Beverly Grossman
description: shell-like shape; top has design with large lobster in front of green wave; sailboats, ULC; crab, LRC; conch and seaweed, LRC; three gold lobster claw feet on bottom
markings: LLC on front, in red: [D]; on bottom, in various colors: [(American eagle symbol)], [H&Co], [FABRIQUE PAR/ HAVILAND a Co/ d\'apr√®s les dessins DE/ Theo. R. David] and [DESIGN PATENTED/ August 10th 1880/ No 11935]
title: Lobster plate from the Rutherford B. Hayes state service
